And the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, prophesy<S>5012</S> against the prophets<S>5030</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> that prophesy<S>5012</S>, and say<S>559</S> thou unto them that prophesy<S>5030</S> out of their own hearts<S>3820</S>, Hear<S>8085</S> ye the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>; <sup>that prophesy out: Heb. that are prophets out of their own hearts</sup>
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Woe<S>1945</S> unto the foolish<S>5036</S> prophets<S>5030</S>, that follow<S>1980</S> <S>310</S> their own spirit<S>7307</S>, and have seen<S>7200</S> nothing! <sup>follow: Heb. walk after</sup> <sup>and: or, and things which they have not seen</sup>
O Israel<S>3478</S>, thy prophets<S>5030</S> are like the foxes<S>7776</S> in the deserts<S>2723</S>.
Ye have not gone up<S>5927</S> into the gaps<S>6556</S>, neither made up<S>1443</S> the hedge<S>1447</S> for the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> to stand<S>5975</S> in the battle<S>4421</S> in the day<S>3117</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>gaps: or, breaches</sup> <sup>made: Heb. hedged the hedge</sup>
They have seen<S>2372</S> vanity<S>7723</S> and lying<S>3577</S> divination<S>7081</S>, saying<S>559</S>, The LORD<S>3068</S> saith<S>5002</S>: and the LORD<S>3068</S> hath not sent<S>7971</S> them: and they have made others to hope<S>3176</S> that they would confirm<S>6965</S> the word<S>1697</S>.
Have ye not seen<S>2372</S> a vain<S>7723</S> vision<S>4236</S>, and have ye not spoken<S>1696</S> a lying<S>3577</S> divination<S>4738</S>, whereas ye say<S>559</S>, The LORD<S>3068</S> saith<S>5002</S> it; albeit I have not spoken<S>559</S>?
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because ye have spoken<S>1696</S> vanity<S>7723</S>, and seen<S>2372</S> lies<S>3577</S>, therefore, behold, I am against you, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
And mine hand<S>3027</S> shall be upon the prophets<S>5030</S> that see<S>2374</S> vanity<S>7723</S>, and that divine<S>7080</S> lies<S>3577</S>: they shall not be in the assembly<S>5475</S> of my people<S>5971</S>, neither shall they be written<S>3789</S> in the writing<S>3791</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, neither shall they enter<S>935</S> into the land<S>127</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; and ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>assembly: or, secret, or, counsel</sup>
Because, even because they have seduced<S>2937</S> my people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Peace<S>7965</S>; and there was no peace<S>7965</S>; and one built up<S>1129</S> a wall<S>2434</S>, and, lo<S>2009</S>, others daubed<S>2902</S> it with untempered<S>8602</S> morter: <sup>a wall: or, a slight wall</sup>
Say<S>559</S> unto them which daub<S>2902</S> it with untempered<S>8602</S> morter, that it shall fall<S>5307</S>: there shall be an overflowing<S>7857</S> shower<S>1653</S>; and ye<S>859</S>, O great hailstones<S>417</S> <S>68</S>, shall fall<S>5307</S>; and a stormy<S>5591</S> wind<S>7307</S> shall rend<S>1234</S> it.
Lo, when the wall<S>7023</S> is fallen<S>5307</S>, shall it not be said<S>559</S> unto you, Where is the daubing<S>2915</S> wherewith ye have daubed<S>2902</S> it?
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; I will even rend<S>1234</S> it with a stormy<S>5591</S> wind<S>7307</S> in my fury<S>2534</S>; and there shall be an overflowing<S>7857</S> shower<S>1653</S> in mine anger<S>639</S>, and great hailstones<S>417</S> <S>68</S> in my fury<S>2534</S> to consume<S>3617</S> it.
So will I break down<S>2040</S> the wall<S>7023</S> that ye have daubed<S>2902</S> with untempered<S>8602</S> morter, and bring<S>5060</S> it down to the ground<S>776</S>, so that the foundation<S>3247</S> thereof shall be discovered<S>1540</S>, and it shall fall<S>5307</S>, and ye shall be consumed<S>3615</S> in the midst<S>8432</S> thereof: and ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Thus will I accomplish<S>3615</S> my wrath<S>2534</S> upon the wall<S>7023</S>, and upon them that have daubed<S>2902</S> it with untempered<S>8602</S> morter, and will say<S>559</S> unto you, The wall<S>7023</S> is no more, neither they that daubed<S>2902</S> it;
To wit, the prophets<S>5030</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> which prophesy<S>5012</S> concerning Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, and which see<S>2374</S> visions<S>2377</S> of peace<S>7965</S> for her, and there is no peace<S>7965</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
Likewise, thou son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, set<S>7760</S> thy face<S>6440</S> against the daughters<S>1323</S> of thy people<S>5971</S>, which prophesy<S>5012</S> out of their own heart<S>3820</S>; and prophesy<S>5012</S> thou against them,
And say<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Woe<S>1945</S> to the women that sew<S>8609</S> pillows<S>3704</S> to all armholes<S>679</S> <S>3027</S>, and make<S>6213</S> kerchiefs<S>4555</S> upon the head<S>7218</S> of every stature<S>6967</S> to hunt<S>6679</S> souls<S>5315</S>! Will ye hunt<S>6679</S> the souls<S>5315</S> of my people<S>5971</S>, and will ye save<S>2421</S> the souls<S>5315</S> alive<S>2421</S> that come unto you? <sup>armholes: or, elbows</sup>
And will ye pollute<S>2490</S> me among my people<S>5971</S> for handfuls<S>8168</S> of barley<S>8184</S> and for pieces<S>6595</S> of bread<S>3899</S>, to slay<S>4191</S> the souls<S>5315</S> that should not die<S>4191</S>, and to save<S>2421</S> the souls<S>5315</S> alive<S>2421</S> that should not live<S>2421</S>, by your lying<S>3576</S> to my people<S>5971</S> that hear<S>8085</S> your lies<S>3577</S>?
Wherefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Behold, I am against your pillows<S>3704</S>, wherewith ye<S>859</S> there hunt<S>6679</S> the souls<S>5315</S> to make them fly<S>6524</S>, and I will tear<S>7167</S> them from your arms<S>2220</S>, and will let the souls<S>5315</S> go<S>7971</S>, even the souls<S>5315</S> that ye hunt<S>6679</S> to make them fly<S>6524</S>. <sup>to make: or, into gardens</sup>
Your kerchiefs<S>4555</S> also will I tear<S>7167</S>, and deliver<S>5337</S> my people<S>5971</S> out of your hand<S>3027</S>, and they shall be no more in your hand<S>3027</S> to be hunted<S>4686</S>; and ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Because with lies<S>8267</S> ye have made the heart<S>3820</S> of the righteous<S>6662</S> sad<S>3512</S>, whom I have not made sad<S>3510</S>; and strengthened<S>2388</S> the hands<S>3027</S> of the wicked<S>7451</S>, that he should not return<S>7725</S> from his wicked<S>7563</S> way<S>1870</S>, by promising him life<S>2421</S>: <sup>by: or, that I should save his life: Heb. by quickening him</sup>
Therefore ye shall see<S>2372</S> no more vanity<S>7723</S>, nor divine<S>7080</S> divinations<S>7081</S>: for I will deliver<S>5337</S> my people<S>5971</S> out of your hand<S>3027</S>: and ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
